subject: SimPedalConfig issue
description_text:
Hello,



I have an older model of your pedals.  SimPedalsConfig4.0 complains that the firmware is incompatible and to use 3.5







The download link on the products page is 404, and it's not available on your support page.  Where can I get version 3.5?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jim Asumendi,  Try using this version 3.5. You can also use FreeJoy 1.7.0 for calibration.
